com.facebook.react

Class MemoryPressureRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.MemoryPressureRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class MemoryPressureRouter
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.content.ComponentCallbacks2
    Translates and routes memory pressure events to the current catalyst instance.
